header.description:
§lRead the Description before using§r
Morph into any mob that you kill!
Morphing will have bugs; please report any and all bugs.

§lMade by §ccda94581§r

If you have issues, contact me at the links found in the description of https://mcpedl.com/cdas-morph/ Spamming angry emojis doesn't help me help you. Before you say something along the lines of "Please add..." on a place other than MCPEDL, again, contact me at the links found at the website above. I can't help you on MCPE Add-ons, I can't help you on whatever other weird website this has popped up to. I can only help you on MCPEDL and the links I posted in the description.

§lChangelog Version 0.0.5:
§rMobs now have movement animation (#4)
The proper mobs now hold out arms (#8)
Blaze now renders properly (#16)
Elder Guardian now renders spikes correctly (#17)
Guardian now renders spikes correctly (#19)
Mobs are no longer super fast in water when they aren't supposed to be (#32)
You can now toggle between ways to obtain in survival (Recipes, Loot Tables, Both, No way), by clicking on the pack gear icon (#51)
Blaze has been removed from hidden WIP mobs
Elder Guardian has been removed from hidden WIP mobs
Guardian has been removed from hidden WIP mobs
Made some small tweaks to Piglin Brute Morph item texture

NEW MOBS! (Note these are still being developed and more features will be added)
Crafting recipes for all new mobs except for Bee and Wolf are still in development
Added Wolf (#33)
Added Wither (#34)
